name: Spark Technology Global Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of domestic service online platform designed to match families with well-trained helpers for household and eldercare needs. The company's application directly connects families in need of professional home care services (house cleaning, eldercare, babysitters, and cooking) to service providers, such as babysitters and caregivers, enabling people in need for local services to save money and improve the lifestyle while helping service providers find jobs easier.
one_liner: Developer of domestic service online platform designed to match families with well-trained helpers for household and eldercare needs. The company's application directly connects families in need of professional home care services (house cleaning, eldercare, babysitters, and cooking) to service providers, such as babysitters and caregivers, enabling people in need for local services to save money and improve the lifestyle while helping service providers find jobs easier.
